snippet.title: Depp, Winslet, Blanchett, more arrive at Palm Springs film festival
snippet.description:
(3 Jan 2016) 
AP Entertainment
Palm Springs, California, 2 January 2016
1. Medium  Johnny Depp and wife Amber Heard pose for photographers at Palm Springs International Film Festival
2. Wide Depp and Heard pose
3. Medium tilt down Heard fashion
4. Close zoom to wide Heard and Depp pose
5. Wide zoom to medium Depp and Kate Winslet embrace, talk and pose on arrivals line
6. Medium zoom to wide Winslet fashion
7. Wide Cate Blanchett poses for photographers
8. Close tilt down zoom to wide Blanchett fashion
9. Medium Blanchett poses
10. Medium tilt down Alicia Vikander fashion
11. Wide Vikander poses
12. Medium tilt down Vikander fashion
13. Wide zoom to close Brie Larson fashion
14. Close tilt up Saoirse Ronan poses for photographers
15. Wide Ronan poses with Paul Dano
16. Medium tilt down Rooney Mara fashion
17. Wide zoom to medium Mara poses, holding ring finger
18. Wide Mara fashion
19. Medium Helen Mirren waves to photographers
20. Medium Mirren fashion
21. Wide Mirren waits for Christian Bale on arrivals line, leaves while he poses with wife
DEPP, HEARD HEADLINE PALM SPRINGS GALA
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard were among the Hollywood stars who made their first red carpet appearances of 2016 in the Southern California desert city of Palm Springs over the weekend. 
Depp also reunited with his "Finding Neverland" costar Kate Winslet at the Palm Springs International Film Festival on Saturday night (2 January 2016). Winslet was there to introduce her "Steve Jobs" costar Michael Fassbender. 
Others on hand: Cate Blanchett, Brie Larson, Alicia Vikander, Rooney Mara and Helen Mirren.
